thread.title: Thandie Newton In Talks for Han Solo Movie (EXCLUSIVE)
thread.title_full: Thandie Newton In Talks for Han Solo Movie (EXCLUSIVE)

author: Justin Kroll
title: Thandie Newton In Talks for Han Solo Movie (EXCLUSIVE)
text:
February 10, 2017 | 03:26PM PT 
“ Westworld ” star Thandie Newton may be heading to a galaxy far, far away. 
Sources tell Variety the actress is in negotiations to join the upcoming Han Solo spinoff starring Alden Ehrenreich. 
Donald Glover, Woody Harrelson and Emilia Clarke co-star in the Disney-Lucasfilm film, with Phil Lord and Chris Miller directing. 
As Variety exclusively reported this week, “Fleabag” actress Phoebe Waller-Bridge is also in talks for a key role . Newton’s character is unknown. 
The untitled Han Solo movie hits theaters May 25, 2018. 
Produced by Kathleen Kennedy and Allison Shearmur, “Solo” takes place before the original “ Star Wars : A New Hope,” similarly to the recent spinoff, “Rogue One,” which has amassed over a billion dollars worldwide. 
Newton is coming off her critically acclaimed turn in HBO’s “Westworld” as Maeve, the renegade robot whose gutty performance earned her 2 SAG (Best performance and ensemble in a drama) nominations and a Golden Globe nomination. She stars filming Xavier Dolan’s “The Death and Life of John F. Donovan” in March and is expected to return to “Westworld” for its second season, which begins shooting later this year. 
She is repped by WME, Untitled Entertainment and Independent Talent Group. Filed Under:
